p: The aim of this study is to investigate the priorities of community resilience against flood risks in Jakarta from the perspectives of three key stakeholder groups: DRR, CCA, and development. This study is important to elaborating the key elements for community resilience and providing an understanding of the common strategies that can be employed for building urban community resilience to flood risks across different groups. Specifically, it will identify the desirable characteristics of flood-resilient communities, as well as the key barriers to community resilience building from the three different stakeholder perspectives.
